ST05-001.name: Shanks ST05-001
ST05-001.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −3 All of your {FILM} type Characters gain +2000 power during this turn.

ST05-002.name: Ain ST05-002
ST05-002.effect: [On Play] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

ST05-004.name: Uta ST05-004
ST05-004.effect: [Blocker] [On Block] DON!! −1 Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

ST05-005.name: Carina ST05-005
ST05-005.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest this Character and trash 1 {FILM} type card from your hand: If your opponent has more DON!! cards on their field than you, add 2 DON!! cards from your DON!! deck and rest them.

ST05-008.name: Shiki ST05-008
ST05-008.effect: If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, this Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle.

ST05-010.name: Zephyr ST05-010
ST05-010.effect: When this Character battles ＜Strike＞ attribute Characters, this Character gains +3000 power during this turn. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −1 This Character gains +2000 power during this turn.

ST05-011.name: Douglas Bullet ST05-011
ST05-011.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −4 Rest up to 2 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less. Then, this Character gains [Double Attack] during this turn.

ST05-014.name: Buena Festa ST05-014
ST05-014.effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {FILM} type card other than [Buena Festa] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

ST05-016.name: Lion's Threat Imperial Earth Bind ST05-016
ST05-016.effect: [Main] DON!! −2 K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less. [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

ST05-017.name: Union Armada ST05-017
ST05-017.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your {FILM} type Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. If that card is a Character, that Character cannot be K.O.'d during this turn. [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
